text: The flu isn’t done yet, as new data suggests infections are rebounding - CNN
fullText: Flu activity has ticked back up slightly in the US, thanks to a very small increase in infections caused by influenza B — viruses distinct from the new subclade K strain that’s been the biggest player this flu season so far.
